lead_paragraph: Arsenal's title hopes were virtually extinguished by a 3-3 draw at West Ham United and Aston Villa's top-flight status is merely mathematical after an eighth successive defeat all but sealed their fate on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Arsenal Title Hopes Hammered, Villa All but Down
headline.main: Arsenal Title Hopes Hammered, Villa All but Down

snippet: Arsenal's title hopes were virtually extinguished by a 3-3 draw at West Ham United and Aston Villa's top-flight status is merely mathematical after an eighth successive defeat all but sealed their fate on Saturday....
